Submodules

Database module

class autoop.core.database.Database(storage)[source]

Bases: object

Manages key-value data storage with persistence, providing methods to set, get, delete, and list data entries

delete(collection, id)[source]

Delete a key from the database :type collection: str :param collection: The collection to delete the data from :type collection: str :type id: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str

Return type:

None

Returns:

None

get(collection, id)[source]

Get a key from the database :type collection: str :param collection: The collection to get the data from :type collection: str :type id: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str

Returns:

The data that was stored, or None if it doesn’t exist

Return type:

Union[dict, None]

list(collection)[source]

Lists all data in a collection :type collection: str :param collection: The collection to list the data from :type collection: str

Returns:

A list of tuples containing the id and data for each item in the collection

Return type:

List[Tuple[str, dict]]

refresh()[source]

Refresh the database by loading the data from storage :rtype: None :returns: None

set(collection, id, entry)[source]

Set a key in the database. :type collection: str :param collection: The collection to store the data in :type collection: str :type id: str :param id: The id of the data :type id: str :type entry: dict :param entry: The data to store :type entry: dict

Returns:

The data that was stored

Return type:

dict

Storage module

class autoop.core.storage.LocalStorage(base_path='./assets')[source]

Bases: Storage

A concrete implementation of the Storage class that saves, loads, deletes, and lists files locally

delete(key='\\\\')[source]

Delete data at a given key :type key: str :param key: Key to delete data,

defaults to ‘\’ for Windows

Return type:

None

Returns:

None

list(prefix='\\\\')[source]

List all paths under a given prefix :type prefix: str :param prefix: Prefix to list files,

defaults to ‘\’ for Windows

Returns:

List of paths

Return type:

List[str]

load(key)[source]

Load data from a given key :type key: str :param key: Key to load data :type key: str

Returns:

Loaded data

Return type:

bytes

save(data, key)[source]

Save data to a given key :type data: bytes :param data: Data to save :type data: bytes :type key: str :param key: Key (path relative to base path) to save data at :type key: str

Return type:

None

Returns:

None

exception autoop.core.storage.NotFoundError(path)[source]

Bases: Exception

Exception raised when a specified path is not found

Module contents

This module provides components and functionality for machine learning operations. It supports database and storage initialization as well as the specific machine learning components.
